section.headline: Results that speak louder than words.
section.subheadline: We don’t just design; we deliver. Browse our deep dives into how we’ve scaled retention and maximized lifetime value for the world’s most ambitious D2C brands.

projects.description: How we built a replenishment engine for AURA Skin using behavioral Klaviyo triggers and lifecycle segmentation.
Optimizing the abandoned checkout sequence with multi-channel SMS and email sync across Klaviyo and Omnisend.
A deep dive into subscriber-save flows and personalized educational nurturing designed in Klaviyo.
Seamless migration from legacy ESP to Omnisend with list hygiene, event mapping, and deliverability hardening.
Built high-intent SMS moments synced with Klaviyo segments to increase repeat purchase frequency.
Re-platformed from Mailchimp to Klaviyo and rebuilt core automations to unlock stronger retention marketing results.

schema.name: INFOBYTES eCommerce Case Studies
schema.description: Portfolio of high-ROI email and SMS marketing campaigns for D2C brands.

hasPart.name: Beauty Brand Replenishment Case Study
hasPart.description: Achieved a 45% increase in repeat orders via Klaviyo automation.

hasPart.name: Fashion SMS Recovery Case Study
hasPart.description: Recovered $240k in abandoned carts using omnichannel SMS strategy.

hasPart.name: Health Subscriber Save Case Study
hasPart.description: Reduced monthly churn by 30% with retention-focused lifecycle education flows.
